channel.title: How do I make a Deob soruce connect to my own P Server?
channel.description:
Normally the Deob connects to ul2.runescape.com, but I want my own server to run. I tried to change ul2.runescape.com to 127.0.0.1 but I get stumped on the update process when it just says "connecting to update server".
How do I run my own server on a 459 source? And yes I have used search.

item.title: How do I make a Deob soruce connect to my own P Server?
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

You can’t, the current servers aren’t compatible with the 459 client.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make a Deob soruce connect to my own P Server?
